title: XWUIFocusTrap Schema
description: Schema for XWUIFocusTrap component - describes both conf_comp (component configuration) and data (component data)

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

returnFocusOnDeactivate.description: Whether to return focus to previously focused element on deactivate

initialFocus.description: Element or selector to focus initially

fallbackFocus.description: Element or selector to focus if initialFocus fails

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

container.description: HTMLElement container to trap focus within
